title: Fun weapons

properties.name: description
properties.value: Fun weapons are wieldable objects that are intended for fun use, as they generally have low or negative bonuses. There is a restriction in the Duel Arena that can be set so only fun weapons may be used in the fight. Fun weapons are generally released for holiday rewards, as the point of the holiday events are for entertainment, without a reward that would give advantages to participants as opposed to non-participants. Some fun items such as Diango's claws are not equippable and as such aren't really considered a weapon.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Fun weapons

Fun weapons are wieldable objects that are intended for fun use, as they generally have low or negative bonuses. There is a restriction in the Duel Arena that can be set so only fun weapons may be used in the fight. Fun weapons are generally released for holiday rewards, as the point of the holiday events are for entertainment, without a reward that would give advantages to participants as opposed to non-participants. Some fun items such as Diango's claws are not equippable and as such aren't really considered a weapon.

All fun weapons only have crush attack styles.

Contents

  • 1 Quest items
  • 2 Holiday items
    • 2.1 One-handed
    • 2.2 Two-handed
  • 3 Treasure Trails items
  • 4 Flowers
  • 5 Other items
